description: This Kotlin source file defines multiple network repository classes for a media application, including content, metadata, assets, and rating repositories. It handles network calls with error handling and provides default values when necessary.

classes.name: NetworkContentRepository
classes.description: Repository for fetching content data over network with default fallbacks.

classes.name: NetworkMetadataRepository
classes.description: Repository for fetching metadata such as indices and rating settings with default fallbacks.

classes.name: NetworkAssetsRepository
classes.description: Repository for fetching asset images, with default fallback in case of errors.

classes.name: NetworkRatingRepository
classes.description: Repository for handling like/dislike status of content over network.

methods.name: withIoCatching
methods.description: Helper function to execute suspend blocks with IO dispatcher and catch exceptions, returning default value on failure.
